title: Why cant I transfer sever anymore?
body: The sever buying option in the account store is no more, any help? Thank you very much.

replies.body: Server transfers are turned [off ](https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) for the preseason update.
Any idea for when it will come again?
I Think Roughly The End Of November
Can I still log in to NA when transferred to another sever?
Server Transfers are only closed until about Nov 20! Once you've transferred you won't be able to login to NA unless you transfer it back to NA. Accounts are only on one server at a time.

> [{quoted}](name=YukinoYuuki,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Pmrw2i6M,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-05T04:58:36.929+0000)
>
> Any idea for when it will come again?

Nov 20th is when transfers should come back up
